newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIAN SERVICES RISE 13.9 PERCENT IN JULY.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIAN SERVICES RISE 13.9 PERCENT IN JULY.

text.p: Commercial services in Romania saw a 13.9 percent real term rise in July, although they were 9.0 percent down year-on-year, a National Statistics Board report said.
Data, adjusted by the number of working days, refers to services delivered mainly to the population and exclude transport, mail and telecoms.
Services to consumers amounted to 351.4 billion lei in July, pushing the seven-month figure to 1.88 trillion lei, which was 2.7 percent up from the equivalent period of 1995.
The private sector took 73.6 percent of seven-month services, up from 73.3 percent in the same period of 1995. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
